name: Ethan Whitehead
text: Was a misguided because the maps/website had me go to the old location. Other then that.. Was very happy with the experience! And had plenty of leftovers!

name: Jenn Cram
text: Nit happy for 1 pizza and 20 dollar bill plus. Cold pizza...no ranch...and driver could care less. Pizza looked like it took a spill pretty much upside down when we received it. Usually pretty happy with these guys but not today.!!!!! Dominoes next time I guess.

name: Michelle Romersheuser
text: They dont even deserve a 1 star rating!! Didnt even get to order. Asked for specials and the male who answered the phone burped in my ear. I called back and asked for a manager, the manager refused to provide a name and was laughing from …More

name: Shannon M
text: First time ordering food since Covid and it was so worth it! The salad was wonderful, best salad I've had out yet. The veggies are cut small and it was so fresh. Very generous portion sizes as well. The pizza is delicious too. This will be our new pizza/salad spot. Go here!

name: Adam Boyd
text: This is usually my go to place but there seems to be a change in the sauce recipe as it doesn't have the same kick I'm use to. Everything else is well done though.

name: Brittany Reynolds
text: Last time I ordered from you guys it was a horrific experience. The dough tasted sour and it was definitely undercooked. I called to complain and got hung up on. Been terrified to order ever since

name: Brittan Lurcott
text: Used to order from here years ago before we moved. Quality had really gone down unfortunately. My husband ordered today and both pizzas were wrong, one of them was so undercooked i could stretch the dough between my fingers without it …More

name: Adam Watson
text: Forgot my Ranch and side sauce that I paid for. Little things make a big difference. Details mater.

name: Derek Brenner
text: Good za! Delivery was super quick and the slide salad was a perfect compliment for a wholesome dinner.

name: John Gherardi
text: Best Pizza in Fort Collins! The cheese pizza and meat pizza are my two favorites. So delicious!!!!

name: Rita Reib
text: Very disappointed today with my salads.  I ordered a Cobb, the lettuce was all romaine hearts.  Usually it's a nice mix of greens. Very large pieces of just romaine.  Not good.  I wanted ranch dressing,  they gave me blue cheese.   I dont like blue cheese.   This is however my first bad experience.

name: Chris B
text: Ordered delivery. I gave 3 stats because the customer service was great but as for the pizza it looked better in the pictures for sure. Wouldnt order again just because theres much better pizza places but you gotta kinda just find out for yourself. But like I said awesome customer service.

name: Shayne Hinkle
text: We were in town for only 3 nights and wanted a nice pizza. It was the best we’ve had since we were in Wilmington, NC. Delivery guy was polite and apologetic for taking to long, but he really wasn’t all that late. Thanks for a tasty memory we can brag about back in Chattanooga. Next time we are dining in.

name: Nathan Beers
text: What I Like About Blackjack Is I Always Prefer My Pizza With Pepperoni Ham And Anchovies While Anika Pounds With Asperger Syndrome And Her Whole Family Prefer Mediaterranean Pizza Because of Anika Pounds With Asperger Syndrome And Her Whole Family Being On The Mediaterranean Diet

name: Chantrelle Crespin
text:
Pizza is always good but they always take over an hour to get delivered to you. Poor customer service!
I ordered at 12:00 and it is now 1:15 and still no food!
* they finally showed up at 1:30 and food was cold.

name: Morgan Greer
text: Very tasty pizza with a lot of toppings and cheese, also liked the fried wings.

name: Frances Hitchcock
text: Really good Pizza.  Went there 3 times during my 10 day stay in Colorado.

name: Elain Q
text: We ordered a jackpot pizza   We ended up with a full house pizza that looked like it was sitting around for a while so not happy today

name: Moss Mason
text: The manager Jesse I believe is his name was incredibly helpful and kind with helping me with my order. Whatta Great guy!

name: Kenneth Peloquin II
text: Best pizza I've had in Colorado. Definitely our favorite.

name: Eric
text: Last 2 pizzas have arrived as shown. Delivery drivers don’t give a F. Also the cooks don’t follow directions very well. Well done shouldn’t have a soft chewy crust. Disappointed.

name: Odette Barr
text: my husband took me to this place. he's been here before and he told me that is one of the best pizzas in the city. he wasn't lying, i love it. this is a great place to go.. love it love it love it

name: Taylor Muir
text: Extremely rude.  Ordered wings and when we got them home half of the wings were left without sauce.  Went back to ask for a cup of sauce and it was like pulling teeth to get- and after getting home we see we’ve also been given the wrong sauce. Thanks!

name: Ramona Moana Lyn Sandersfeld
text: I decided to get Blackjack Pizza Delivery! It was Awesome 💟 the Staff was friendly,  curtious, helpful and Delivered in less than 30 min. @ 10pm. Near CSU Campus! ***Ask for current Pizza Specials! …More

name: Frank Gonzales
text: Best pizza. Sauce actually has flavor. Lota of cheese. None better.

name: Karl Hengeveld
text: Great pizza and specials. Amazing after a late night out.

name: Michelle Rink
text: These guys are awesome! Did my order through order up and the ice cream I ordered was out stock and I just changed my number and forgot to update it. The very sweet driver took the time to bring all of the in stock flavors to me to choose. They did an amazing job with the food as well :)

name: Cam
text: Excellent pizza, always fast delivery and very cheap. There's almost always a coupon for a large 2 topping pizza for $10 how can you beat that??

name: Carol Smulling
text: This pizza place is AWESOME!  Manager Mason was great to work with. Ordering process was quick and easy. Driver John delivered our GREAT pizza in the time i was quoted it would arrive. Very courteous and friendly staff here!!  I will …More

name: Vanessa Aschmann
text: Edited to say: The new owner is attempting to get better systems in place and offered a credit for our next order due to the trouble. Planning to give them another chance and will update this review again if our experience is better. …More

name: Zenny Fry
text: One of my favorite places in town to get pizza or have delivered. Amazing sauces and toppings most places dont carry!

name: Gabe Betzner
text: Pizza was dropped and missing a piece they still delivered it. Couldn't eat any of it, called the store asked to speak with manager they would not get on the phone. Said it was to late to send a new pizza at 7:30pm. Was told I wouldn't be charged, I was.

name: Sarah Banes
text: Don’t order from here. It took two hours for our food to arrive and in my opinion is too expensive for the quality of the food. I was quoted approximately an hour for delivery time and when I called to see where it was they said it had …More

text: I walked into this Blackjack Pizza with a gift card. The guy behind the counter couldn't get the card to work. Rather than tell me to pay for my pizza with cash or credit. They asked how much was on the card and recommended cinnabread to …More

name: anthony h
text: Use to eat here over 10 years ago and I loved it. Recent reviews had me scared to try it again but everything I had was good. Good pizza and bread and salad.

name: steven sneary
text: Good for

text: Love the pizza and the calzones!

text: Ordered my ONE pizza at 8:21. Online confirmation of my order said 45 minutes for delivery time. I called at 9:40 to see what the hold up was. He stated he got to my order 30 MINUTES LATE and it just walked out of the store and will arrive …More

text: The pizza never delivered on time as the web says and then they drop your pizza

text: This pizza is super delicious! The cheese they use is really outstanding, and they've really perfected the crust. I was also amazed by how quick delivery was! It arrived exactly 30 minutes after I placed the order

text: Busy pizza place near the CSU campus. Check out the Hooked app for deals. Staff are friendly and there is free parking.

name: Brandon Castleberry
text: After being disappointed with my recent orders from Crazy Karl's, I decided to give Blackjack a try. Karl's always took 1.5-2.5 hours during dinner time, Blackjack said 30 min. Our order arrived in exactly 30 min. The Pizzas were great, …More

name: Nathan s
text: Best pizza. Fresh taste. Don't eat papa johns.  They can be a little slow on customer service. Might be understaffed. They always need drivers which could be poor management but I don't know. Bad workforce to pick from, bad managers, or …More

text: I ordered a extra large pizza from this location. Shortly after I was having stomach problems then my wife threw up and my father in law now has stomach issues. When the pizza arrived it was slid into the side of the box and very well done. …More

name: Steph Price
text: This was one of the best delivery pizzas we’ve had. We had never had black jack before and it was delicious! The pizza was hot and was intact which surprised me. When we’ve ordered from pizza hut you'd swear they shook your pizza and dropped it. But not BJ. We will definitely be ordering from them again!

name: Bill Tuttle
text: Always have real good service here to be honest. The folks are always super chill. I've had the pizza several times from this location its been bomb. The wings are also usually on point.

name: Carol black
text: The Mediterranean salad is the best and always fresh!

name: Jessica Salazar
text: Gone here for years but lately have been recieving horrible customer service. The last time I ordered delivery, I was quoted 35 to 45min. Didn't recieve pizza for an hour and 40 min and asked to speak to manager. He was rude. Told me if I …More

text: It's my it's my favorite pizza in Fort Collins also I believe is a store located in leveling nearby Town top-grade Pizza always hot and ready my favorite

name: Rod Damron
text: Place a simple order for  2 topping pizza. Was told 45 mins for delivery. Hour and a half later still no delivery. Called and manager said driver was on the road for an hour. Still no delivery. Canceled order and voided charge.

name: Paul Stafford
text: There is no reason Blackjack Pizza shouldn't have a 5 star rating all the way down the review page. This is the friendliest staff and best pizza in Fort Collins. I have been to all the other pizza places in the immediate area and not one of …More

name: Sandy Anderson
text: Perfect! Hot, fresh, on time. Appreciated and enjoyed. The pizzas were outstanding and devoured! Would highly recommend.

name: Connor Pippin
text: Ridiculous...ordered a calzone at 8pm around 9:30pm I called to hear my order was misplaced, now that's fine...but then after ANOTHER hour I call, talk to a rude manager who wanted to charge me AGAIN for the same order because the driver …More

name: Josef K
text: I have never been hung up on by a manager in my entire life.  The manager would not honor a coupon directly off of the blackjack website, and told me he was very busy and therefore incapable of helping me.  I'm sorry that your company does …More

name: Bria Whitmore
text: I ordered and the ETA was 1 hr. After 2 hours, I called, and they said there was a mistake and it would be another 30 minutes minimum. They didn’t even offer anything comped. I will never order from here again, very disappointed at the service.

name: James Stewart
text: I have been a fan of Blackjack Pizza for some time now and they continue to deliver a fantastic product! One of my favorites!

name: Mollie Davis
text: Just moved to fort collins about a month ago and was not disappointed with black jack. the staff was super friendly and even let me keep my leftovers under their warmer while i did some business across the street.  super helpful with the menu. just an all around nice place to stop for a bite.

name: Amy Kay
text: Very rude on the phone Steve. Very bad pizza. Looked two days old with three whole toppings called to complain was spoken down to like a child by Steve. Classy. Very very rude. Customer service is poss poor. Food is worse!!!! Ask for refund was told NO. By Steve.

name: Tylea Enz
text: Blackjack is usually an okay pizza, but they recently starting tasting very sub par. It's cheap if you want to save money, but if you want flavor, go elsewhere. It took an hour and 40 minutes to receive my food and then it ended up being basically tasteless.

name: fallon moritz
text: Pizza was cold. Looked like it sat under a heat lamp. Cheese was super dark brown didnt even pull apart and be stringy when you picked up a slice. No flavor hard as cardboard. We toke 1 bite and threw it away.

name: Robert Shriver
text: Blackjack doesnt deliver out side of five miles and they are the only one in town. If I could rate negative stars I would. They move not even one mile to the new location and now does not deliver to my house. Blackjack lost a customer

name: Thomas Whitney
text: Good food, great staff, very clean, and fast to get your food to you

name: Mark Mitchell
text: We ordered a pizza and they gave us the wrong order. They quoted us 20 minutes and it took an hour. They then quoted us a half hour, to get us our right order. We have had this happen so many times so we called to talk to a manager to see …More

name: chris goerge
text: Order delivery for the family on movie night. The price was great. Was told 35-45 minutes for delivery....the driver was there in 29. Food was hot and the super hot wings were even hotter! A+

name: Brent Kacz
text: Driver was very rude and not helpful at all when after delivery I call them back to tell them I got the wrong pizza and wrong sauce for the wings I ordered. Refused to give me my money back and come get the pizza and wings pretty much said oh well and laughed it off. never again will I eat there

name: Andrew Bushey
text: Chewy and mostly flavorless pizza. I didn't expect much when I ordered it but it was still a big letdown. Their pan pizza may be a different story, but the normal style pizza is just not good.

name: Houchen Chang
text: Pretty good pizza. Santa Fe is strongly recommended with extra garlic. Very fast service.

name: Austin Lee
text: My favorite pizza place in Ft Collins. The mozzerella cheese is to die for and brings the pizza to a whole new level. A+
